armies.name: adepta sororitas
armies.description: Devout warriors of the Ecclesiarchy, known for their faith and ferocity in battle.

armies.name: adeptus custodes
armies.description: Elite guardians of the Emperor, standing watch over the Golden Throne.

armies.name: adeptus mechanicus
armies.description: Masters of technology and machinery, serving the Omnissiah.

armies.name: agents of the imperium
armies.description: A diverse group of operatives working to maintain the stability of the Imperium.

armies.name: astra militarum
armies.description: The vast armies of the Imperium, composed of countless regiments of human soldiers.

armies.name: grey knights
armies.description: Secretive and elite warriors, dedicated to fighting the daemonic threats.

armies.name: imperial knights
armies.description: Noble houses piloting gigantic war machines, bringing devastation to the battlefield.
